Tests.testName: Playground : Add new colleague to a company
Tests.desc: This test is about to check adding a new colleague to the company and filling technology and seniority
Tests.expectedResult: Colleague should be added to the company displaying technology and seniority level.
Tests.step2: Go to Playground page/ People tab

Tests.desc: This test is about to check creation of a new technology instance.
Tests.expectedResult: Technology should be added to list of technologies.
Tests.step2: Go to Playground page/ Technologies tab

Tests.desc: This test is about to check creation of a new senniorities instance.
Tests.expectedResult: Seniority should be added to list of senniorities.
Tests.step2: Go to Playground page/ Senniorities tab

Tests.desc: This test is about to check creation of a new team instance.
Tests.expectedResult: Team should be added to list of teams.
Tests.step2: Go to Playground page/ Teams tab

Tests.desc: This test is about to check creation of a new project instance.
Tests.expectedResult: Project should be added to list of projects.
Tests.step2: Go to Playground page/ Projects tab
